meanings.definition: A fixed regular payment, typically paid on a monthly basis, made by an employer to an employee.
meanings.sent1: My salary helps me pay for my rent every month.
meanings.sent2: She received her salary at the end of the month.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally spent my entire salary on ice cream!
meanings.sent4: Her salary was a lifeline in the sea of expenses.
meanings.sent5: The salary is like a steady river flowing into my bank account.

meanings.definition: A fixed regular payment, typically paid on a monthly basis, made by an employer to an employee as compensation for work done.
meanings.sent1: His salary reflects the hard work he puts in every day.
meanings.sent2: The company increased the salary of all its employees.
meanings.sent3: I dreamt that my salary was made of chocolate coins!
meanings.sent4: Her salary was a beacon of appreciation in the workplace.
meanings.sent5: The salary is the sweet fruit of labor.
